name: Super World Hopper
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 38

Mission

Deliver cube-shaped crates to corresponding cargo stations (red, green and blue) on three different worlds. Use launchpads to travel between the worlds. You gain extra time for each delivered crate and points depending on the delivery distance. A new crate appears after each successful delivery.

Default controls
  • Movement: arrow keys
  • Flip hopper: X
  • Drop cargo: Space
  • Restart level: R or Enter
  • Quit level: Q or Esc
